author: eptwts
text:
the best way to find problems to solve is to put yourself into a position in which you experience problems

just start any business...

whether that's an agency, affiliate, youtube automation, whatever...

there's no world in which you don't run into 100 real problems within the first month

the best way to solve problems is to experience them firsthand & deeply understand the pain that they bring

this will help you build a solution & show you how to market it

you'll know where people with this problem look for solutions & know how to speak to their pain points because you also lived this problem & came out on the other side
